actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary, S. Rept. 94-1131.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3518) entitled "A bill for the relief of Sea Gate, Inc., a North Carolina corporation, and Charles M. Reeves, Jr." to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 3518, entitled "A bill for the relief of Sea Gate, Inc., a North Carolina corporation, and Charles M. Reeves, Jr.," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3518) entitled "A bill for the relief of Sea Gate, Inc., a North Carolina corporation, and Charles M. Reeves, Jr." to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
